## Ignore Visual Studio temporary files, build results, and
## files generated by popular Visual Studio add-ons.

# Build folders
bin/
obj/
Debug/
Release/
x64/
x86/

# Visual Studio files
.vs/
*.suo
*.user
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

# Build results
*.exe
*.dll
*.pdb
*.cache
*.log

# User-specific files
*.rsuser
*.userprefs

# Other temp files
[Tt]emp/
*.tmp

# Backup and autosave
*~
*.bak
*.swp

# NuGet packages
*.nupkg
packages/
*.snupkg

# Publish folder
publish/
PublishProfiles/

# Others
*.dbmdl
*.jfm
*.vscode/
.idea/

# ASP.NET temp files
ClientBin/
node_modules/
bower_components/

# Logs
*.log
Logs/
